Forties.text:
Wind
In east, southerly, becoming cyclonic later, 4 to 6, occasionally 7 at first. In west, southwesterly 4 to 6, becoming variable 2 to 4.
Sea state
In east, moderate or rough, occasionally very rough at first. in west, slight or moderate, occasionally rough at first.
Weather
In east, rain or showers. In west, showers.
Visibility
In east, moderate or good, occasionally poor. In west, good occasionally poor.

Weather
